backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user registration, profile management, poop entry logging with timestamps and wipe counts, and ranked user statistics calculation including total poops, wipes, TP rolls, and averages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the emoji alignment fix in ProfileSetup.tsx for mobile view, linking to test REQ-14 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration, highlighting the emoji centering fix using flexbox in ProfileSetup.tsx.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color palette defining light and dark mode CSS variables for a warm amber/orange theme suitable for the poop tracker app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Poop Tracker application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup with authentication flow that routes users to login, profile setup, or dashboard based on Internet Identity and profile status, with routes for dashboard and log poop pages.
frontend/src/components/AllTimeStandings: Comprehensive rankings table displaying all users sorted by poops and wipes, showing profile previews, total stats, calculated TP rolls (3 sheets/wipe, 200 sheets/roll), average wipes, and leader badges.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper with sticky header containing logo, home navigation, and logout button, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution and copyright.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays King Pooper and King Wiper leaders with profile previews, badges, total stats, and MVP recognition when one user holds both titles.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePreview.t: Reusable component rendering user profile with emoji, custom background gradient, colored border in three sizes (sm/md/lg), and optional display name.
frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Exports arrays of emoji, color hex codes, and CSS gradient backgrounds for user profile customization options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching user profiles, registering profiles, creating poop entries, and retrieving ranked user statistics from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens using HSL values for consistent theming across the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user welcome message, quick log button, leaderboard, all-time standings, and app information cards.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login button and app branding for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/LogPoop.tsx: Multi-step form page for logging poop entries with confirmation, wipe count input, and success states, using mutations to submit data to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation page where users set display name and customize their profile by selecting emoji, color, and background options with live preview.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme colors using OKLCH color space, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (authentication, profiles, logging, leaderboards, daily views) and known issue with emoji centering on mobile.
